definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: I'm looking for a jacket. I'd like one with a bag.
sentences.chinese: 我正在找一件夾克，我想要件帶兜的。

sentences.english: Bullets cut through his jacket; one cut off half his right ear.
sentences.chinese: 子彈扯開中尉夾克，有一發削掉中尉半隻右耳。

sentences.english: You’d better wear a light jacket.
Could I have this jacket dry-cleaned?
sentences.chinese: 我這件夾克可以乾洗嗎？

sentences.english: Tom scorched his jacket carelessly while he was smoking his pipe .
sentences.chinese: 湯姆抽菸鬥時不小心把夾克燒焦。

sentences.english: Zhang Hua quickly ran back to his flat and poured water over his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 張華迅速的跑回他的公寓，並用水弄溼他的夾克。

sentences.english: Waterproof jacket that transforms into a one person sleeping bag.
sentences.chinese: 這是一件防水夾克，可以變身爲單人睡袋哦。

sentences.english: Her hair was singed and her anorak was burnt .
sentences.chinese: 她頭髮燒焦了，帶風帽的夾克也燒掉了。

sentences.english: He was wearing a black blazer and white Nikes.
sentences.chinese: 他穿一件黑色運動夾克，腳蹬白色耐克鞋。

sentences.english: I can’t wait to buy the first computer jacket. Maybe I’ll never have to go to the office again!
sentences.chinese: 我已經等不及要去買第一件計算機夾克了。

sentences.english: Chandler: Blue blazer back. He-he wants it back.
sentences.chinese: 我是說要回，他想要回他的夾克。

sentences.english: Double-breasted suit jackets should always have peak lapels.
sentences.chinese: 雙排扣男西裝夾克應該是峯狀翻領。
他的夾克裁製得很漂亮。

sentences.english: Let me know the price of the Tshirts and jackets of the long sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 讓我知道價格的t恤衫和夾克的長袖衫。

sentences.english: He was wearing dark clothes yet I couldn't tell if it was a jacket or shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他穿著深色衣服，但我不確定究竟是襯衫還是夾克。

sentences.english: Red Jacket lay sprawled on the cobbles one hundred feet below.
sentences.chinese: 紅夾克四肢伸展，撲躺在三十多米底下的卵石街上。

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
